OpenAI introduces GPT 5.2, its most advanced model to date, showcasing significant improvements in understanding and generating natural language. The new capabilities promise to enhance user interactions, increase efficiency, and revolutionize applications across various industries.

News üì∞Ô∏è
1.)
Top 5 Most Clicked News Articles From Last Week
A.)
OpenAI May Launch GPT-5.2 Next Week In Rapid Response To Google, Rumored Release Set For December 9
| TheVerge.com | December 5, 2025
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman declared a ‚Äúcode red‚Äù situation earlier this week, pushing staff to respond quickly to increased competition from Google and Anthropic. Sources familiar with OpenAI‚Äôs plans tell me that the company is planning its first response to Gemini 3 with its upcoming GPT-5.2 update.
B.)
What‚Äôs New With ChatGPT Voice
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | December 5, 2025
ChatGPT Voice is now integrated directly into the chat interface, allowing seamless communication without the need for a separate mode. Users can engage in conversation while accessing real-time answers, visuals, and past messages, enhancing the overall interactive experience.
C.)
Interview Practice With ChatGPT
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | December 8, 2025
Boost confidence and performance in job interviews by engaging in interactive practice sessions with ChatGPT. This innovative approach enables users to rehearse their responses and fine-tune their communication skills effectively.
D.)
15 Futuristic Gadgets You‚Äôll Actually Use by 2026
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | December 7, 2025
Explore the near-future landscape of technology with 15 innovative gadgets poised to enhance everyday life by 2026. These advancements span areas such as AI assistants, wearable health devices, and smart home tools, all aimed at streamlining how we live, work, and interact with our environment.
E.)
Diffusion LLMs? Inside Inception Labs‚Äô New Breakthrough with Stefano Ermon
| The Neuron | YouTube.com | December 8, 2025
Corey Noles interviews Inception Labs co-founder Stefano Ermon to discuss the groundbreaking application of diffusion-based large language models in AI. The conversation delves into the innovative capabilities of Mercury and Mercury Coder, exploring their potential to surpass traditional transformer-based systems in efficiency and reasoning.
December 15, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
2.)
NVIDIA Leads An Open-Model Release Monday!
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 15, 2025
NVIDIA recently released the Nemotron 3 Nano, a model that emphasizes efficiency with 3.3x higher throughput than comparable models. This release includes the complete training recipe, which is aimed at reshaping how production AI systems are built and deployed amidst a larger trend of open-source releases by various AI companies.
3.)
The Renaissance of the American Factory
| a16z | YouTube.com | December 15, 2025
In 2026, Erin Price-Wright of a16z predicts a resurgence in American manufacturing, leveraging AI and autonomous technologies to revolutionize energy, construction, and industrial processes. This transformation promises enhanced efficiency in permitting and design, enabling the rapid production of essential infrastructure like nuclear reactors and data centers.
4.)
Reinforcement Learning Tutorial ‚Äì Rlvr With Nvidia & Unsloth
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | December 15, 2025
Dive into the world of reinforcement learning with NVIDIA and Unsloth, where cutting-edge technologies converge to enhance AI capabilities. Explore detailed resources and tools that will empower your learning journey and keep you at the forefront of AI advancements.
5.)
From Zero to READY: Recreating C64 BASIC in Visual Studio Code
| Dave‚Äôs Garage | YouTube.com | December 15, 2025
Dave harnesses the power of OpenAI Codex to meticulously recreate Microsoft‚Äôs CBM BASIC v2 for the iconic Commodore 64. The project is a nod to retro computing enthusiasts and showcases techniques for modern development environments.
6.)
Top 15 New Technology Trends That Will Define 2027 {Part 2}
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | December 15, 2025
Explore groundbreaking advancements that will shape 2027, including developments in artificial intelligence, robotics, and digital security. These emerging trends are redefining industries and creating new opportunities, making it crucial for tech enthusiasts and professionals to stay informed on the innovations that will drive the future.
7.)
Nvidia Launches Nemotron 3 Open Models In Nano, Super, And Ultra Sizes For Advanced Agentic AI
| Nvidianews.nvidia.com | December 15, 2025
NVIDIA today announced the NVIDIA Nemotron‚Ñ¢ 3 family of open models, data and libraries designed to power transparent, efficient and specialized agentic AI development across industries.
8.)
Alibaba Qwen Code V0.5.0 Launches With Vscode Integration And Typescript SDK
| X.com | December 15, 2025
Qwen Code v0.5.0 is here.
December 14, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
9.)
Investor Gavin Baker: Context Beats IQ In AI
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 14, 2025
Gavin Baker emphasizes that the future of AI lies not in raw intelligence but in usefulness, advocating for AIs that leverage extensive context and memory to better assist users. This paradigm shift suggests that AIs should evolve from being smart chatbots to effective, reliable agents capable of managing complex tasks efficiently.
10.)
Almost Timely News: 2025 AI Year In Review
| Chris Penn | YouTube.com | December 14, 2025
Reflecting on the significant events in the AI landscape throughout the past year, this analysis explores breakthroughs and failures that shaped the industry. As the year that felt both extensive and fleeting comes to a close, insights are shared on the state of AI heading into 2026.
11.)
Merriam-Webster Selects Slop, Meaning Low-Quality AI Content, As 2025 Word Of The Year
| Merriam-webster.com | December 14, 2025
Merriam-Webster‚Äôs human editors have chosen slop as the 2025 Word of the Year. We define slop as ‚Äúdigital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence.‚Äù All that stuff dumped on our screens, captured in just four letters: the English language came through again.
December 13, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
12.)
AI News: Deepseek Controversy, GPT-5.2, OpenAI x Disney, Meta Closed-Source and More!
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | December 13, 2025
New developments in the AI sector are explored, including the controversy surrounding DeepSeek, the unveiling of GPT-5.2, and the collaborative efforts between OpenAI and Disney. Additionally, the transition of Meta towards closed-source models and various industry disruptions are highlighted, providing critical insights into the evolving AI landscape.
December 12, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
13.)
The Top 10 Wildest GPT-5.2 Demos
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 12, 2025
The latest showcase of GPT-5.2 features incredible demonstrations ranging from building a 3D graphics engine to playing Pok√©mon Crystal live on stream. The article highlights both remarkable feats and some outputs that appeared impressive but were misleading, indicating the potential and challenges of this advanced AI model.
14.)
AI Eats The World: Benedict Evans On The Next Platform Shift
| a16z | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
Benedict Evans and Erik Torenberg evaluate the evolving landscape of AI and its potential to transform industries, questioning whether it signifies a profound platform shift akin to electricity. They delve into AI‚Äôs deployment challenges, the competitive positioning of major tech players, and speculate on the future developments that could redefine the technology‚Äôs impact.
15.)
AI News: GPT-5.2 Is Here! (Plus Runway 4.5 and the Next Image AI Leaks)
| Matt Wolfe | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
OpenAI announces the highly anticipated release of GPT-5.2, along with significant updates from its image generation models. The episode also features hands-on testing of Runway‚Äôs latest video generation technology and insights into Mistral‚Äôs new coding model and Zhipu AI‚Äôs advancements in vision-language integration.
16.)
OpenAI Just Released Their Best Model Ever (GPT 5.2)
| The AI Advantage | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
OpenAI introduces GPT 5.2, its most advanced model to date, showcasing significant improvements in understanding and generating natural language. The new capabilities promise to enhance user interactions, increase efficiency, and revolutionize applications across various industries.
17.)
GPT 5.2: OpenAI Strikes Back
| AI Explained | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
An in-depth analysis reveals whether OpenAI has regained its leadership in AI technology with GPT-5.2. Key themes include advancements in token processing, computational efficiency, and long-term model improvements, alongside nine crucial insights beyond mainstream coverage.
18.)
Gemini 3 Deep Think Reviewed & More AI Use Cases
| The AI Advantage | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
Igor explores the capabilities of Google‚Äôs Gemini 3 Deep Think model along with its steep access fee. The session includes a hands-on evaluation of new AI integrations in Adobe apps and innovative prompting techniques inspired by Andrej Karpathy.
19.)
OpenAI Just Dropped GPT-5.2‚Ä¶ (Woah)
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
The announcement of GPT-5.2 showcases groundbreaking advancements in AI technology, promising remarkable enhancements in reasoning and efficiency. OpenAI‚Äôs latest model is poised to redefine possibilities in AI applications, making it a pivotal moment for developers and users alike.
20.)
OpenAI Strikes Back! GPT-5.2 & Disney Comes to Sora
| AI For Humans | YouTube.com | December 12, 2025
OpenAI‚Äôs launch of GPT-5.2 marks a significant advancement in AI technology. Meanwhile, a groundbreaking partnership with Disney enables the integration of beloved characters into Sora, reshaping the landscape of AI and Hollywood collaboration.
21.)
Google Adds Gemini AI Translation Model And New Features To Google Translate
| Blog.google | December 12, 2025
We‚Äôre bringing Gemini‚Äôs most powerful translation capabilities to Google Translate for text, launching a beta experience for live speech-to-speech translations with headphones, and adding new languages to the app for practice and skill building.
22.)
Google Upgrades Gemini Audio Models, Adds Live Speech Translation To Google Translate App
| Blog.google | December 12, 2025
Earlier this week, we introduced greater control over audio generation with an upgrade to our Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash Text-to-Speech models.
23.)
Bbva Partners With OpenAI To Deploy ChatGPT Enterprise For 120,000 Employees In AI-Driven Banking
| OpenAI.com | December 12, 2025
BBVA and OpenAI are expanding their collaboration with a multi-year strategic AI transformation program that will see ChatGPT Enterprise rolled out to all 120,000 global employees, a 10x increase on their current deployment. Under this new agreement, OpenAI will help advance BBVA‚Äôs AI strategy, which aims to transform the customer experience, enable new ways of working, and optimize internal operations.
December 11, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
24.)
WTF Is ChatGPT ‚ÄúGarlic‚Äù? ChatGPT 5.2 Is Here‚Ä¶
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 11, 2025
OpenAI released GPT-5.2, internally codenamed ‚ÄúGarlic,‚Äù boasting significant upgrades, including a 400,000-token context window. Disney simultaneously announced a $1 billion investment in OpenAI, becoming the first major content partner for Sora, marking a pivotal shift in enterprise AI integration.
25.)
10 Years
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | December 11, 2025
Reflecting on a decade of transformation, this presentation chronicles significant milestones and future aspirations. Leaders and innovators share their insights, looking back on progress while setting ambitious goals for the years ahead.
26.)
2026 Will Be Ruled by These 20 New Tech Trends
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | December 11, 2025
Explore the groundbreaking technologies set to redefine our lives and industries in 2026, including advancements in AI, robotics, and space tech. With insights into how these innovations will shape the future economy and daily routines, this overview provides essential information for creators, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts alike.
27.)
Getting Started With Connectors In Claude.ai
| Anthropic | YouTube.com | December 11, 2025
Enhance your efficiency with Claude by integrating the tools and applications you already rely on. Instructions provided will guide you through setting up connectors, enabling Claude to access and utilize your files, apps, and workflows seamlessly.
28.)
Why Disney Really Paid $1 Billion for OpenAI
| Theoretically Media | YouTube.com | December 11, 2025
Disney‚Äôs recent $1 billion partnership with OpenAI marks a significant shift in content strategy as it becomes the first major collaborator for Sora, introducing innovative technologies while simultaneously embroiled in legal disputes with Midjourney and Google. The implications of this agreement raise questions about character usage restrictions and Disney‚Äôs evolving approach to user-generated content on platforms like Disney+.
29.)
Why We Built‚ÄîAnd Donated‚ÄîThe Model Context Protocol (MCP)
| Anthropic | YouTube.com | December 11, 2025
Stuart Ritchie from Anthropic engages with David Soria Parra to unveil the Model Context Protocol (MCP), an innovative open standard designed to link AI with external tools and services. The discussion delves into the protocol‚Äôs origins, its unique features, and Anthropic‚Äôs decision to donate it to the Linux Foundation for broader community adoption.
30.)
OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2, Its Most Advanced AI Model For Professional Tasks And Long-Running Agents
| OpenAI.com | December 11, 2025
We are introducing GPT-5.2, the most capable model series yet for professional knowledge work.
31.)
Google Unveils GenTabs, An AI-Powered Web Navigation Tool Built With Gemini 3 In Google Labs
| Blog.google | December 11, 2025
Join the waitlist to try GenTabs through Disco, our new discovery vehicle from Google Labs to test ideas for the future of the web.
32.)
Rivian Unveils Custom Silicon And Advanced AI Platform For Next-Gen Autonomous Vehicle Experience
| Rivian.com | December 11, 2025
Rivian today announced significant breakthroughs in vertically integrated automotive technology at its first Autonomy & AI Day. During the event at its Palo Alto offices, the company unveiled its proprietary, purpose-built silicon, outlined its roadmap for next-generation vehicle autonomy, and introduced an evolved software architecture underpinned by artificial intelligence (AI).
33.)
Runway Unveils GWM-1, A Real-Time, Interactive General World Model For Simulating Reality
| RunwayML.com | December 11, 2025
GWM-1: our state-of-the-art General World Model, built to simulate reality in real time. Interactive, controllable and general-purpose.
34.)
OpenAI To Launch ChatGPT Adult Mode In Q1 2026, Confirms OpenAI‚Äôs CEO Of Applications
| TheVerge.com | December 11, 2025
OpenAI wants to get its age-prediction model right before launching the feature.
35.)
Disney Accuses Google Of Massive Copyright Infringement After OpenAI Sora Character Usage Deal
| TheVerge.com | December 11, 2025
Google is ‚Äòflooding the market with infringing works,‚Äô Disney claims.
36.)
Trump Signs Executive Order To Block State AI Laws, Threatens Loss Of Federal Broadband Funding
| TheVerge.com | December 11, 2025
Federal agencies are being ordered to challenge many state laws that restrict AI.
37.)
Microsoft Integrates OpenAI GPT-5.2 Into Microsoft 365 Copilot And Copilot Studio
| Microsoft.com | December 11, 2025
Today we‚Äôre excited to bring OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-5.2 to Microsoft 365 Copilot and Microsoft Copilot Studio. GPT-5.2 brings together GPT-5.2 Thinking, the best model yet for complex problems and strategic insights, and GPT-5.2 Instant, an efficient model for everyday writing, translation, and skill-building.
38.)
Google Launches Upgraded Gemini Deep Research With New Interactions Api For Developers
| Blog.google | December 11, 2025
We have reimagined Gemini Deep Research to be more powerful than ever. It is now accessible to developers via the new Interactions API, launching alongside DeepSearchQA, a benchmark for complex web search tasks.
39.)
OpenAI Marks 10 Years Of AI Progress And Shares Reflections On Advancing Toward Beneficial Agi
| OpenAI.com | December 11, 2025
OpenAI has achieved more than I dared to dream possible; we set out to do something crazy, unlikely, and unprecedented. From a deeply uncertain start and against all reasonable odds, with continued hard work it now looks like we have a shot to succeed at our mission.
40.)
OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2, Its Most Advanced AI Model For Science And Math Applications
| OpenAI.com | December 11, 2025
One of our hopes for strong AI is that it will accelerate scientific research for the benefit of everyone, helping researchers explore more ideas, test them faster, and turn discoveries into impact.
41.)
Disney And OpenAI Partner To Bring Classic Characters To Sora, Advancing Responsible AI In Entertainment
| OpenAI.com | December 11, 2025
As part of this three-year licensing agreement, Sora will be able to generate short, user-prompted social videos that can be viewed and shared by fans, drawing on more than 200 Disney, Marvel, Pixar and Star Wars characters.
December 10, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
42.)
Microsoft‚Äôs 37M+ Conversation Study Reveals Surprising AI Usage Pattern
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 10, 2025
Microsoft‚Äôs analysis of over 37 million Copilot conversations uncovers surprising patterns in AI usage, showing that health-related inquiries dominate during all times, while programming queries are most common on weekdays. The study highlights a shift in conversation topics over time, from programming in January to societal discussions by September.
43.)
How to Make & Edit Images with Nano Banana for Beginners
| The AI Advantage | YouTube.com | December 10, 2025
Harness the power of Google‚Äôs Nano Banana AI for generating and editing images effortlessly. In just three minutes, discover essential features and tips for both Nano Banana and Nano Banana Pro, currently available at no cost in Gemini.
44.)
Meta‚Äôs SAM 3: AI Vision Just Got a Huge Upgrade (Free)
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | December 10, 2025
Meta has unveiled SAM 3, an impactful enhancement in AI vision technology that promises to redefine industry standards. Users can explore the groundbreaking features and improvements that set this version apart, making it an exciting addition to the AI toolkit.
45.)
The Unicorn Founder Who Delegated Everything
| a16z | YouTube.com | December 10, 2025
Jonathan Swanson shares insights on building successful companies while mastering the art of delegation. Joined by Erik Torenberg, they explore how combining human and AI assistants can enhance productivity and reshape the future of work, emphasizing the importance of designing life around leverage.
46.)
ChatGPT Adds Free Adobe Photo And PDF Editing, No Creative Cloud Required
| TheVerge.com | December 10, 2025
Just describe your edits to ChatGPT, and the Photoshop, Acrobat, and Express apps will do it for you or surface the tool you need.
47.)
Google Integrates Gemini 3 AI Into Stitch Design Tool For Enhanced App UI Generation
| Blog.google | December 10, 2025
Starting today, we‚Äôre bringing the power of Gemini 3 to Stitch, our experimental AI-powered design tool. Gemini 3 in Stitch will mean higher quality UI generation to help you bring any idea to life.
48.)
Spotify Launches Prompted Playlist Feature, Letting Users Customize Music Recommendations With Prompts
| Engadget.com | December 10, 2025
Users in New Zealand will be able to write prompts for custom playlists.
49.)
Nvidia-Backed Starcloud Trains First AI Model In Space, Launching New Era For Orbital Data Centers
| CNBC.com | December 10, 2025
Washington-based Starcloud launched a satellite with an Nvidia H100 graphics processing unit in early November, sending a chip into outer space that‚Äôs 100 times more powerful than any GPU compute that has been in space before.
50.)
Google Unveils Gemini 2.5 TTS Models With Improved Style, Pacing, And Multi-Speaker Capabilities
| Blog.google | December 10, 2025
Today, we‚Äôre announcing significant enhancements to our Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro Text-to-Speech (TTS) preview models.
51.)
Alibaba Qwen3-Omni-Flash Upgrade: Enhanced AI Personality And Smarter Language Features Released
| X.com | December 10, 2025
Qwen3-Omni-Flash just got a massive upgrade (2025-12-01 version).
December 9, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
52.)
OpenAI, Anthropic, And Block Team Up?!
| TheNeuronDaily.com | December 9, 2025
OpenAI, Anthropic, and Block have formed a new alliance and donated critical infrastructure for the Agentic AI Foundation in an effort to standardize AI integration. With generative AI spending growing to $37 billion in 2025, this partnership aims to establish open standards that prevent vendor lock-in and enhance collaboration across AI applications.
53.)
AI News: GPT-5.2, Devstral 2, Boom Superpower, MCP Nonprofit And More!
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | December 9, 2025
Innovation and developments in AI take center stage, exploring the latest updates on GPT-5.2 and groundbreaking projects like Devstral 2. In addition, highlights include philanthropic efforts by MCP and the exciting prospect of Boom Superpower and new datacenter expansions.
54.)
Hands-On With Microsoft 365 Copilot: Exclusive New Features Demo
| The Neuron | YouTube.com | December 9, 2025
At Microsoft Ignite 2025, Callie August unveils significant enhancements to Microsoft 365 Copilot, demonstrating innovative features such as collaborative voice functionality and enhanced agent capabilities across Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. These updates aim to transform how users engage with their applications, streamlining tasks and improving productivity through advanced reasoning and real-time data integration.
55.)
My AI Character Got More Views Than Me. I‚Äôll Show You How.
| Theoretically Media | YouTube.com | December 9, 2025
A progressive exploration of AI avatar technology highlights the significant advancements found in Kling AI Avatar 2.0. The video features an in-depth comparison of Kling, Veed Fabric, and HeyGen, showcasing the latest techniques for character extraction, voice cloning, and editing to enhance viewer retention across social media platforms.
56.)
Why Sam Altman Is Panicking + 9 New AI Tools
| The Next Wave | YouTube.com | December 9, 2025
The latest episode dives into the internal upheaval at OpenAI triggered by competitive advancements from Google, including Gemini 3 and Nano Banana Pro. Analysts assess the implications of these developments on AI innovation and discuss the potential impact of newly emerging tools, while offering insights into OpenAI‚Äôs ongoing strategy amidst this evolving landscape.
57.)
Mcdonald‚Äôs AI-Generated Christmas Ad Disappoints, Fails To Resonate With Audiences
| TheVerge.com | December 9, 2025
If you‚Äôre having a stressful holiday season, the answer is McDonald‚Äôs, at least, that‚Äôs what a now-removed AI-generated ad suggested, as reported by Futurism.
58.)
Anthropic Donates Model Context Protocol And Launches Agentic AI Foundation For AI Safety
| Anthropic.com | December 9, 2025
Today, we‚Äôre donating the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to the Agentic AI Foundation (AAIF), a directed fund under the Linux Foundation, co-founded by Anthropic, Block and OpenAI, with support from Google, Microsoft, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Cloudflare, and Bloomberg.
59.)
Accenture Partners With Anthropic To Help Enterprises Scale AI Solutions From Pilot To Production
| Anthropic.com | December 9, 2025
Anthropic and Accenture today announced a major expansion of their partnership to help enterprises move from AI pilots to full-scale deployment. Key elements of the announcement below.
60.)
OpenAI Launches Certification Courses To Help Users Build AI Skills And Advance Career Opportunities
| OpenAI.com | December 9, 2025
AI will unlock more opportunities for more people than any technology in history‚Äîhelping companies run more efficiently, empowering people to turn ideas into reality, and creating new kinds of jobs. More than 800 million people already use ChatGPT each week to build skills, find work, and solve real-world problems. AI is being incorporated into more workplaces, and research shows workers with AI skills earn about 50% more than those without them. We also know AI will be disruptive, leaving many people unsure which skills matter most or where to start. And while OpenAI can‚Äôt eliminate that disruption, we can help people everywhere prepare to navigate it successfully.
61.)
OpenAI Partners With Deutsche Telekom To Deliver Multilingual AI And ChatGPT Enterprise Across Europe
| OpenAI.com | December 9, 2025
Today, we‚Äôre announcing a new collaboration with Deutsche Telekom to bring advanced AI capabilities to millions of people across Europe and to support their teams with the most capable tools from OpenAI.
62.)
OpenAI Co-Founds Agentic AI Foundation To Boost Open-Source Agentic AI Under Linux Foundation
| OpenAI.com | December 9, 2025
Today, OpenAI is co-founding the Agentic AI Foundation (AAIF) under the Linux Foundation, alongside Anthropic and Block, and with the support of Google, Microsoft, AWS, Bloomberg, and Cloudflare. The AAIF is designed to provide neutral stewardship for open, interoperable infrastructure as agentic AI systems move from experimentation into real-world production.
63.)
Mistral AI Launches Devstral 2 Coding Model And Vibe CLI For Open-Source Terminal AI Development
| Mistral.ai | December 9, 2025
Today, we‚Äôre releasing Devstral 2‚Äîour next-generation coding model family available in two sizes: Devstral 2 (123B) and Devstral Small 2 (24B). Devstral 2 ships under a modified MIT license, while Devstral Small 2 uses Apache 2.0. Both are open-source and permissively licensed to accelerate distributed intelligence.
64.)
OpenAI‚Äôs New Image Model Spotted, Likely Releasing With GPT 5.2 This Week
| X.com | December 9, 2025
New OpenAI image model finally potentially sighted. It‚Äôs happening. See below for the outputs. Most likely these are from the next GPT image model.
65.)
Orchids Launches World‚Äôs First Vibe Coding IDE, Tops App Bench Development Rankings
| X.com | December 9, 2025
Introducing Orchids, the world‚Äôs first vibe coding IDE. Orchids can build, watch, and listen on par with a human developer.
66.)
Diffsynth-Studio Releases Qwen-Image-I2l: Open-Source Suite Transforms Images Into Custom Loras
| X.com | December 9, 2025
DiffSynth-Studio just dropped: Qwen-Image-i2L ‚Äî the first open-source suite that turns a single image into a custom LoRA.
67.)
Secwar Launches Revolutionary AI Platform To Empower American Warriors
| X.com | December 9, 2025
Today, we are unleashing GenAi.mil. This platform puts the worlds most powerful frontier AI models directly into the hands of every American warrior. We will continue to aggressively field the world‚Äôs best technology to make our fighting force more lethal than ever before. And all, American made.

About:
Access to Information Is a Human Right. Aira is an app that connects people who are blind or low vision to professional visual interpreters for secure access to visual information, anytime, anywhere. Organizations who value accessibility and inclusivity partner with Aira to offer the app for free to their employees, students, and customers.
